page.title: 20Changing Times
page.content: out,an extra three miles to a car owner is not much of a problem, but the closure is during the worst winter months and it is not unknown for the village to be cut off from surrounding areas for days at a time due to snow blocking the narrow access lanes. The landlord of the village pub has already suffered loss of earnings due to the last road closure, and now faces a bleak future with the next. Because there are no shops in Cockernhoe, the building of a huge Fine Fare supermarket within the new housing complex, only 15 minutes walk away, must have been a boon for local housewives.Stocking a range of goods from furniture and home decorating to freshly-baked bread and cakes, it enables local people to do all their shopping under one roof.
